description: Students examine expository texts such as (auto)biographical writings, journalistic articles,
German websites, and critical essays, with an eye to understanding the strategic organization
of the text, the information presented, and the various layers of critical voices in a text.
Coursework includes weekly writing assignments on the analysis of structure, style, argumentation,
evidence, and perspective in a text.  The course is designed to teach students writing strategies.
toward German major, German studies concentration, and management studies concentration.
